ch0099_40_jun/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Finally! I’ve been waiting for-EVER!
ch0099_40_jun/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been itching to you show you how cool me
and my partner Pokémon are!
ch0099_40_jun/7101_0701_01_10: It’s a hero’s duty to punish evildoers!
ch0099_40_jun/7101_0701_02_10:
If we see anyone who’s up to no good, we’ll
combine our powers...
ch0099_40_jun/7102_0701_01_10: Heh heh heh... We look awesome, right?!
ch0099_40_jun/7102_0701_02_10: I’ll wear this and protect everybody from evil!
ch0099_40_jun/7102_0701_03_10:
And you just watch—one day I’ll be as strong and
cool as Dad and Master Wake!
ch0099_40_jun/7103_0701_01_10:
Heracross and I go way back, since our days in
Sinnoh.
ch0099_40_jun/7103_0701_02_10:
I’ve lost count of how many times he’s hurled an
opponent away with that prized horn of his! He
really is just like a superhero!
ch0099_40_jun/7103_0701_03_10:
And that’s why he makes the perfect partner for
me right now!
ch0099_40_jun/7104_0701_01_10:
You know how heroes always show up juuust in
the nick of time?
ch0099_40_jun/7104_0701_02_10:
Well, in a hero show, I’ve gotta wait till the last
possible second before I jump into the action...
ch0099_40_jun/7104_0701_03_10:
But I can’t tell you how many times I’ve almost
done it too early!
ch0099_40_jun/7104_0701_04_10: I’m just super bad at staying still and waiting!
ch0099_40_jun/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you know
what it takes to be a hero? ’Cause just being
strong won’t cut it!
ch0099_40_jun/7105_0701_02_10:
Oh, I’m not gonna just tell you the answer!
There’s no point if you don’t figure it out for
yourself!
ch0099_40_jun/7105_0701_03_10: But hey, if you DO know what’s most important...
ch0099_40_jun/7105_0701_04_10:
Then let’s protect the world together!
...Or, y’know, something like that! Heh heh.
ch0099_40_jun/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s something that oughta help you out of a
pinch!
ch0099_40_jun/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to thank me! Helping those in need is
a hero’s duty!
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m feeling super antsy... I really wanna help
someone!
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0701_02_10: This hero is totally fired up for justice!
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0701_03_10:
You call me right away if you’re ever in trouble,
OK?
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0701_04_10: No matter where you are, I’ll be there in a flash!
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0702_01_10:
...Well, maybe I can’t make it ANYWHERE in just
“a flash.”
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0702_02_10:
But I WILL run as fast as I possibly can to
wherever you are!
ch0099_40_jun/2501_0702_03_10:
...And I know, I know! I’ll watch where I’m going,
heh heh!
ch0099_40_jun/2511_0701_01_10:
I was a fan of a lot of different heroes when I
was little!
ch0099_40_jun/2511_0701_02_10:
Dawn and I would even fight sometimes over
which one of us got to play the good guy!
ch0099_40_jun/2511_0701_03_10:
Of course, these days we’d just settle any
arguments with a Pokémon battle!
ch0099_40_jun/2511_0702_01_10:
Playing the villain can be kinda fun, actually, in its
own way!
ch0099_40_jun/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe I should ask Brycen to swap roles
sometime!
ch0099_40_jun/3001_0701_01_10:
I try to take after my master and wake up early!
Come to think of it, though, I’m not even sure if he
does wake up early...
ch0099_40_jun/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m definitely prepared for some battling today!
There’s no way I’ll forget anything this time.
ch0099_40_jun/3005_0701_01_10:
Time for my secret night training! 
Wait, if you’ve found me, it’s not secret anymore!
